text: Motherwell railway station is a train station in Motherwell, Scotland. It is a big station, with four platforms, making it the biggest station in North Lanarkshire. The station can get you to big places such as London and Glasgow. There is a train every 10 minutes going to Glasgow Central station. It is managed by First ScotRail. == References == == Other websites == Category:Railway stations in Scotland Category:North Lanarkshire
title: Motherwell railway station
